page.title: 06TRADITIONAL CRAFTS
page.content: The most important local craft involves the long practiced harvesting of{withies}(young willow saplings cut in rotation),which are processed and manufactured into baskets and containers of all shapes and sizes.The preparation of withies involves{ {cutting,boiling, and beating,}to arrive at the right qualities of suppleness and strength.When ready the withies are bundled up and sent to the basket makers locally and further afield. Quite a few basket makers are blind or partially sighted but are well able to produce skilled examples of their craft.Sedgemoor is one of the most important withy growing areas in the country. There is a {candlemaker} in the village and several local {artists}who paint excellent pictures of mostly rural scenes ranging in price from a few to hundreds of pounds
